overview: If you can't be with the one you love, then Love The One you're with - and that's exactly what these young hotties intend to do! Whether it's just the two of them enjoying some al fresco shenanigans that sees them 69ing and making enough noise that the neighbors are bound to complain or a feisty threesome that sees these star-crossed lovers getting their fair share of cock and cum. Explosive and passionate encounters ensue and it's all 100% bare!
title: Love the One
